title: Relation
description: Allows to declare a relation between two specifications.

create.description: The related objects can be created from the current represented object

delete.description: The related objects can be deleted from the current represented object

get.description: The related objects can be retrieved from the current represented object

rest_name.description: rest_name used as a link to the related object

update.description: The related objects can be updated from the current represented object
